review.title: “Handle more than one subject along with working in Placement Dept. as faculty coordinator.”
review.pros: Pros – We can have dignity of our Job. Respect among faculty of all the colleges around. Chance to learn.
review.cons: Cons – Capable employees are not encouraged. Incapable are not discouraged. Everyone is treated equally. The economics says, such environments may not thrive.Too much of hierarchy like HOD, then Dean, then Director, etc., this reduces transparency of the employees with the Secretary.The respective Heads understand their job as an authority rather than responsibility.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Please try to reduce the hierarchy levels so that contacting the Secretary will be easier.
